item.title: South Indian Hindu Marriage - Andhra Style
item.description: South Indian weddings are traditionally going to be planned or happen for one or more than a day, which involve having mehndi for the bride particularly, in some cases times groom as well have mehndi. Few of the south Indians have Haldi ceremonies as well. Groom's arrival itself is celebrated. And the wedding ceremony begins with a few poojaâ€™s & traditions. And at the end, the couple will be sen
